data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 15,061 believers in the county of Essonne to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Essonne, Île-de-France, France
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Essonne
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 15,061 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Essonne, Île-de-France, France. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Arab, Tunisian people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Essonne that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Essonne.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.section_summary:
the county of Essonne, Île-de-France, France has a population of 1,225,700.

We estimate Essonne has 15,061 people who might know Jesus, 749,540 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 461,099 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Essonne, Île-de-France, France who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.
